arStrings.szText: When you cast {c_important}Blizzard{/c} it will periodically spawn exploding {c_important}Ice Spikes{/c} that deal {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_2]{/c} damage. Your {c_important}Ice Spikes{/c} deal {c_number}[Affix_Value_1 * 100|%x|]{/c} increased damage to {c_important}{u}Frozen{/u}{/c} enemies.

{c_important}Blizzard{/c} periodically spawn {c_important}Ice Spikes{/c} that deal {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_2]{/c} damage. Your {c_important}Ice Spikes{/c} deal increased damage to {c_important}{u}Frozen{/u}{/c} enemies.
